remarks: Properties of a Hilbert-space-valued state.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Jun-2006.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: hstel2 $p |- ( ( ( S e. CHStates /\ A e. CH ) /\ ( B e. CH /\ A C_ ( _|_ ` B ) ) ) -> ( ( ( S ` A ) .ih ( S ` B ) ) = 0 /\ ( S ` ( A vH B ) ) = ( ( S ` A ) +h ( S ` B ) ) ) ) $.
